meanings.definition: The number that is one more than twelve.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to thirteen candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She turned thirteen years old last week.
meanings.sent3: Thirteen cupcakes were not enough for the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The clock struck thirteen, signaling midnight.
meanings.sent5: The baker baked exactly thirteen cookies for the school bake sale.

meanings.definition: A group or set of thirteen individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: There were thirteen chairs set up for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team consisted of thirteen players.
meanings.sent3: Thirteen puppies ran around the yard, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The baker arranged thirteen cupcakes in a perfect circle.
meanings.sent5: Thirteen books were neatly stacked on the shelf.
